org.apache.ctakes.dictionary.lookup2.dictionary

Class DictionaryDescriptorParser

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.ctakes.dictionary.lookup2.dictionary.DictionaryDescriptorParser

  • public final class DictionaryDescriptorParser
extends java.lang.Object
    Parses the XML descriptor indicated by the externalResource for DictionaryDescriptorFile in the XML descriptor for the Rare Word Term Lookup Annotator DefaultJCasTermAnnotator

    If there is a problem with the descriptor then the whole pipeline goes down, so care must be taken by the User and any messages (logged or otherwise) produced by this class should be as specific as possible. Devs take notice.

    Author: SPF Affiliation: CHIP-NLP Date: 11/20/13

    • Method Detail

      • parseDescriptor

        public static DictionarySpec parseDescriptor(java.io.File descriptorFile,
                             UimaContext uimaContext)
                                      throws AnnotatorContextException
        Initiates the parsing of the XML descriptor file containing definition of dictionaries and a consumer for the Rare Word Term dictionary paradigm
        Parameters:
        descriptorFile - XML-formatted file, see the dictionary-lookup resources file RareWordTermsUMLS.xml for an example
        uimaContext - -
        Returns:
        DefaultDictionarySpec with specification of dictionaries and a consumer as read from the descriptorFile
        Throws:
        AnnotatorContextException - if the File could not be found/read or the xml could not be parsed

      • parseDictionaries

        private static java.util.Map<java.lang.String,RareWordDictionary> parseDictionaries(UimaContext uimaContext,
                                                                   Element dictionariesElement)
                                                                             throws AnnotatorContextException
        Creates dictionary engines by parsing the section defined by this.DICTIONARIES_KEY
        Parameters:
        uimaContext - -
        dictionariesElement - contains definition of all dictionaries
        Returns:
        Mapping of dictionary names to new RareWordDictionary instances
        Throws:
        AnnotatorContextException - if the resource specified by this.EXTERNAL_RESOURCE does not match the type specified by this.IMPLEMENTATION or for some reason could not be used

      • parseDictionary

        private static RareWordDictionary parseDictionary(UimaContext uimaContext,
                                 Element dictionaryElement)
                                           throws AnnotatorContextException
        Creates a dictionary by parsing each child element of this.DICTIONARIES_KEY
        Parameters:
        uimaContext - -
        dictionaryElement - contains the definition of a single dictionary
        Returns:
        a dictionary or null if there is a problem
        Throws:
        AnnotatorContextException - if any of a dozen things goes wrong
